---
title: "Regression analysis"
output:
  html_document: default
  word_document: default
---

```{r }
Elevation<- c(600,700,1000,1300,1200,1450,950,1100,2000,1750,1350,1500)
Temperature<-c(45,50,46,47,35,39,40,30,50,29,50,40)
plot(Elevation,Temperature)
abline(lm(Temperature~Elevation),col="red")
```
We can use summary to dig deeper into linear model
```{r}
lm1<- lm(Elevation~Temperature)
summary(lm1)

```

The result shows from P-value that way larger than 0.05, so elevation may not be a good independent variable to temperature
